entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Copilot Rename Suggestions: No suggestions for identifiers referenced in methods that touch the end of file #74545
  • Collection expressions apply to types implementing IEnumerable<T> and containing an Add(X) method but no implicit conversion between X and T #74543
  • String interpolation of only strings should light-up with string.Concat(params ReadOnlySpan<string>) #74538
    .NET 9
  • CSharpSemanticModel.GetSymbolInfo returns SymbolInfo with Symbol equal to null #74537
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName from CompilerVisibleItemMetadata #74533

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35123.88 #74532

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix URI handling when comparing encoded and unencoded URIs #74544
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rerun generators when an additional file is saved. #74542
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report fading locations as part of the main diagnostic #74541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74540
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move more code down to shared layer #74539
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make it possible to build/run tests on linux-arm64 #74536
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Cherry pick project system workspace update fix to 17.11 #74506
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adds support for metadata LSP language features in VSCode #74488
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74531
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Cleanup LSP error reporting #74530
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid assert in emit layer when intercepted call implicitly captures receiver to temp #74509
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include InterpolatedString conversions in standard implicit conversion from expression assert #74529
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • EnC: Implement support for System.Threading.Lock #74526
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Remove assembly loading light-up from scripting #74409
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • EnC: Implement support for partial properties #74494
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not parse methods with accessibility modifiers as local functions (alt) #74495
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address issues with VSIX item publishing projects and FUTDC #74470
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Instance extensions: prevent user's code from changing value of receiver when it has reference type and is passed by reference. #74508
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in SymbolKey.ResolveString #74513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce Roslyn packages impact on UI thread #74501
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
